title: Large 2 bed, 1.5 baths, includes heat/hot water, 1 pkg.
posting_body: ['Spacious renovated unit on 2nd floor in brick building,', 'includes heat/hot water and a parking space.', 'New kitchen appliances, wall to wall, 1.5 baths.', 'Walk to parks by the river, restaurants, shops, etc.', 'No pets or smoking.', 'Available now or August.', 'Good credit and monthly employment required.', 'Set up your viewing now.', 'There is a real estate fee of $2,500.', 'if you rent this condo.', 'Monaco R.E.', 'Newton, MA', '617-974-3019', 'Leave me your email address for photos and tell me a bit about yourself', 'and any other co-tenants.', 'Please reference: 2 bedroom $2,500 Newton in your text or message Thank you']
